last_episode_to_air.name: An Indecent Proposal
last_episode_to_air.overview: After coming up short with the fundraiser, Ashandra refocuses her goals for the Wellness Centre, a Bollywood charity event hosted by Cindi Rose brings all of the women together, Monica fails to realise that Imad may be ready to commit to her.

name: Married to Medicine Houston
overview: Follow five dynamic women on the rise as they face high stakes in both their social circle and the medical world. These doctors and wives of doctors appear to have it all: they are educated, attractive, and polished professionals, but beneath the surface, viewers will see major obstacles that threaten their upward momentum. After putting their lives on hold to be a physician or a dedicated wife, the ladies must navigate marriage, children, family, and Houston society.

episodes.name: Houston, We Have a Problem
episodes.overview: Houston's premier philanthropist, Cindi Rose, invites aspiring socialite Rachel to co-chair one of the biggest charity events of the year, then Cindi makes a subtle dig that deeply offends Rachel; plastic surgeon Erika's biological clock ticks down.

episodes.name: Holi Moly
episodes.overview: Rachel, Erika and Ashandra feel torn when Monica and Elly invite the women to conflicting cultural celebrations that fall on the same day; things get icy when the group's ill-fated efforts to attend both events leave Elly furious and Monica agitated.

episodes.name: Boiling Point
episodes.overview: The group gathers for Rachel's annual crayfish boil; Imad refuses to commit; Erika's negative attitude displeases Rachel; Rachel reveals some disturbing information to Elly about an insult Monica recently hurled in the audiologist's direction.

episodes.name: Sorry Not Sorry
episodes.overview: Monica attempts to convince Rachel to reconcile with Cindi Rose after their fallout; Erika and Derek share their unconventional fertility plans with his conservative family; Ashandra agrees to help out her church with a public health project.

episodes.name: War at the Roses
episodes.overview: An elegant Shabbat dinner at Cindi's turns ugly; Rachel hosts a night out with Ashandra and Elly, who is still reeling from the disparaging remarks Monica made about her; Maribel attracts a suitor after dipping her toes into the online dating pool.

episodes.name: Raging Dr. Elly
episodes.overview: During a brunch, Monica is blindsided when Elly finally confronts her; the argument threatens to tear the entire group apart as everyone is forced to take sides; Erika and Derek receive unfortunate news in their quest to conceive.

episodes.name: Monica in Waiting
episodes.overview: Imad returns to town after receiving an ultimatum from Monica; Erika transforms a patient's life; Monica and Elly attempt to repair their relationship; Cindi Rose is left speechless when Ashandra skips her Kentucky Derby hat party.

episodes.name: Takes Two to Sparkle
episodes.overview: A double date with Erika and Derek leads to a revelation for Monica; a death in the family threatens to derail Elly's birthday celebration; Rachel's patience is tested yet again when she learns that Cindi Rose is making accusations about her.

episodes.name: I Left My Heart in San Antonio
episodes.overview: With the Wellness Centre on the line, Ashandra pulls out all the stops for her Havana Nights fundraiser, Erika weighs her options when it comes to having children, Monica surprises Imad in San Antonio, hoping to find out if marriage is in her future.

episodes.name: An Indecent Proposal
episodes.overview: After coming up short with the fundraiser, Ashandra refocuses her goals for the Wellness Centre, a Bollywood charity event hosted by Cindi Rose brings all of the women together, Monica fails to realise that Imad may be ready to commit to her.
